long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Party is an amazing extension to sync & watch videos on youtube.com

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS OF YOUTUBE PARTY:

1. Click on “Add to Chrome” button.
2. Then, click on “Add Extension” button prompted on screen.
3. Click on “Puzzle” icon on right hand side of Chrome bar.
4. Pin the extension as it should be blue pin in front of the extension name “YouTube Party”.
5. Play the video on youtube.com and then click on extension icon to Create a Party.
6. Share the URL with your friend to join the party.

How to Join the YouTube Watch Party?

Open the shared link and make sure to ask your friend to install the extension on his/her device.

—————————————

You can sync and do group chat while enjoys shows on YouTube website.

Host or Join Watch Parties in order to watch YouTube videos together.

Send Emojis.

Enjoy YouTube Watch Party!

Disclaimer: YouTube Party is in no way affiliated with Google LLC.

Disclosure / Consent:

YouTube Party enhances your browsing experience by providing useful features and participating in affiliate programs. This helps sustain the service without affecting the cost of your purchases. Explicit consent is required before any affiliate code is applied, and you have full control over this feature. Learn more in our Privacy Policy (https://ottwatchparty.com/privacy-policy/), Terms of Use (https://ottwatchparty.com/terms-of-use/), and Affiliate Disclosure (https://ottwatchparty.com/affiliate-disclosure/).
